Award Winning Podcast: With 2,200 podcast entries from 46 states and Washington, D.C., one of Smithville Middle School's 8th grade podcast teams received “Honorable Mention” for their entry “Food Features” in the NPR Student Podcast Challenge! The podcast features Smithville students Angela Lawhorn, Abigail Nichols, Rachel Carroll, and Carly Lloyd!

The podcast features the team blindly tasting strange food samples and in the end, trying to guess what it is. The samples are all picked by the host.

“Summer doesn't just include parties or swimming pools, it also includes chilly, mouth-watering foods and drinks as well. Let's dive into the wonders it can bring.” Check out the award winning podcast by visiting, https://bit.ly/3cxkOs4.
